com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.renderer

Interface IRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICharRenderer, IChunkRenderer, IConsoleOverlayRenderer, IDebugRenderer, IDialogRenderer, IEntityRenderer, IImageRenderer, IMapRenderer, IObjectRenderer, IPlayerRenderer, ISegmentRenderer, IShapeRenderer, ITextRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRenderer, CharRenderer, ConsoleOverlayRenderer, ConsoleRenderer, DebugRenderer, DialogRenderer, EntityRenderer, ImageRenderer, MapRenderer, ObjectRenderer, PlayerRenderer, ShapeRenderer, TextBoxRenderer, TextRenderer, UIRenderer

    public interface IRenderer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void contextChanged(IViewTransformer viewTransformer, org.joml.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
      Called when the render context has been changed.
      void contextCreated()
      Called when the render context has been created.
      void contextDestroyed()
      Called when the render context has been destroyed.

    • Method Detail

      • contextCreated

        void contextCreated()
        Called when the render context has been created.

        Low level dependencies should be initialized here.

      • contextChanged

        void contextChanged(IViewTransformer viewTransformer,
                    org.joml.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
        Called when the render context has been changed.

        THe given view properties can be used for rendering later.

        Parameters:
        viewTransformer - The view transformer used for rendering.
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix used for rendering.

      • contextDestroyed

        void contextDestroyed()
        Called when the render context has been destroyed.

        Low level dependencies should be disposed here.
